text_block_list.text:
……Grass Wonder was certainly strong but, 
even so, Spe, you ran really well.
text_block_list.name: <username>

text_block_list.text:
If you still want to challenge it, there's a way, 
or should we avoid the [Prix de l'Arc de Triomphe]……
text_block_list.name: <username>

text_block_list.text:
My condition was good, and I did a lot of training, 
I really used all of my strength to run.
text_block_list.name: Special Week

text_block_list.text:
……even with that she passed me, and pulled further and 
further away, I wasn't able to catch Grass-chan.
text_block_list.name: Special Week

text_block_list.text:
……With the way I am now, even if I enter the 『Prix de l'Arc de Triomphe』, 
there's definitely no way I can win.……
text_block_list.name: Special Week

text_block_list.text:
In her mind, her dream of becoming "Japan's #1 Uma Musume" 
must be getting more vague―――

The reality that the 『Prix de l'Arc de Triomphe』 was a huge 
challenge was becoming more clear, and this time's loss was a 
bigger shock than she expected.

……Got it. In that case, let's change our approach. 
Focusing on domestic races also still has its merits.
text_block_list.name: <username>

text_block_list.text:
And then we'll properly observe the 『Prix de l'Arc de Triomphe』. 
It's a chance to get a good look at that stage, since it's not 
like you won't have a second chance.
text_block_list.name: <username>

text_block_list.text:
And then we'll properly observe the 『Prix de l'Arc de Triomphe』. 
It's a chance to get a good look at that stage, since it's not 
like you won't have a second chance.
text_block_list.name: <username>

text_block_list.text: ……Okay.
text_block_list.name: Special Week

text_block_list.text: Haa……Haaa……Haaa……Haaa……Haaaa!
text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa

text_block_list.text: Spuuuuuurtーー!!
text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa

text_block_list.text: Haa……Haaa……Huuu～……
text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa

text_block_list.text: (Ring! Ring!)
Allo～!? Bonjouuuur!
text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa

text_block_list.text: 『Hello, El. Are you, perhaps, in the middle of training?』
text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder

text_block_list.text: I was just about to take a break! My stomach is growling!
text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa

text_block_list.text: 『Fufuu, I'm glad you sound fine』
text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder

text_block_list.text:
Grass, good job at the 『Takarazuka Kinen』! 
The last straight was really astonishing, amazing, and exciting!
text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa

text_block_list.text:
It was really impactful, it makes me not want 
to lose to you and unable to stay still!
text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa

text_block_list.text: 『Well, well, I'm honored you feel that way』
text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder

text_block_list.text:
Spe-chan and El, and everyone else, because they showed me their 
running, I was able to keep my dream in mind.
text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder

text_block_list.text:
Someday, I'll repay this debt. 
My dream――by perfecting my run, and standing at the top.
text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder

text_block_list.text: 『Wow! As usual, you're burning with fighting spirit, huh!』
text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa

text_block_list.text: ……El too, it's almost time for you to challenge the strongest.
text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder

text_block_list.text:
The 『Prix de l'Arc de Triomphe』 is only 3 months away, 
until then I'll keep on getting stronger!
text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa

text_block_list.text: And then my dream――I'll prove that I'm the world's strongest!!
text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa

text_block_list.text:
『……If you're in that condition, then you'll 
be able to give it your all it seems』
text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder

text_block_list.text: My all, is it――
text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa

text_block_list.text:
Everyone! For seeing me off I'm thankful, 
inspired, and filled with emotion!
text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa

text_block_list.text: Are you really okay with us not going with you to the airport?
text_block_list.name: Special Week

text_block_list.text:
Bueno! Isn't today a weekday? 
Everyone needs to go study properly!
text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa

text_block_list.text:
Leave it to me! I'll study enough for El-chan, 
and I'll liven up Japan's races enough for El's part too!
text_block_list.name: Tsurumaru Tsuyoshi

text_block_list.text:
Having a classmate that's challenging the 
world, it kind of makes me proud too.
text_block_list.name: King Halo

text_block_list.text:
I'm looking forward to hearing the news about your exploits. 
I'll show you that my exploits can reach even France!
text_block_list.name: King Halo

text_block_list.text: Ehehe, I'll do my best!
text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa

text_block_list.text: Alright, in that case……I need to get going……
text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa

text_block_list.text: Really……I need to get going……
text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa

text_block_list.text: ……El, you still have a little bit more time left, don't you?
text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder

text_block_list.text: Que……?
text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa

text_block_list.text: Fufuu, in that case, to cheer you up――
text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder

text_block_list.text: What the heck is this～～!?
text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa

text_block_list.text:
Like I said, it's to cheer you up～ 
Alright, face forward and focus, okay?
text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder

text_block_list.text:
So this is how we're sending her off, is it? 
Fufuu, how interesting!
text_block_list.name: King Halo

text_block_list.text:
Allllright! We'll send her off with all we've got!! 
Uooooooooooh～～～～!
text_block_list.name: Tsurumaru Tsuyoshi

text_block_list.text: Me too! Daaaaaaa～～!
text_block_list.name: Special Week

text_block_list.text: Oh～ oh～, things are heating up, huh～?
text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky

text_block_list.text: Wait, wait!? Are we running for real!?
text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa

text_block_list.text: Haaa……haaa……El, please show us.
text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder

text_block_list.text: The run of someone aiming for world's strongest, show us……!
text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder

text_block_list.text:
……El is an Uma Musume aiming for world's strongest……! 
Something like hesitating is……!
text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa

text_block_list.text: Just watch me! Yaaaaaaa～～～～!!
text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa

text_block_list.text:
……I left all my worries back in Japan. The 『Prix de l'Arc de 
Triomphe』, I'll be challenging it with all my strength!
text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa

text_block_list.text: 『Yes, make sure to show me a grand performance』
text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder

text_block_list.text:
『And after that……I'm looking forward 
to running a race with that El♪』
text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder

text_block_list.text: Ehehe, yeah!
text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa

text_block_list.text:
Finally, the day that the Japanese Uma Musume, El Condor Pasa, 
challenges those at the world's apex has arrived.
text_block_list.name: Announcer

text_block_list.text:
Of course she's being cheered on through the broadcast, 
but here in France the voice of 2000 supporters 
can be heard pushing her forward.
text_block_list.name: Announcer

text_block_list.text:
El Condor Pasa, will she be the first to accomplish this 
historic feat that no other Japanese Uma Musume has so far?
text_block_list.name: Announcer

text_block_list.text:
(……My dream, to prove that I'm the 
world's strongest on this stage……)
text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa

text_block_list.text:
And here, the Uma Musume who has garnered 
the most attention enters the paddock!
text_block_list.name: Announcer

text_block_list.text:
Until now out of 7 races, 6 wins and one 2nd place finish! 
Called France's strongest, Montjeu, makes her appearance!
text_block_list.name: Announcer

text_block_list.text: ……Fuu.
text_block_list.name: Montjeu

text_block_list.text: Montjeu……
text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa

text_block_list.text:
El Condor Pasa, I'm well aware of your accomplishments. And that 
after a long campaign, you've come to try and win this race too.
text_block_list.name: Montjeu

text_block_list.text:
The true strength of Japan's Uma Musume, 
by all means show it to me here.
text_block_list.name: Montjeu

text_block_list.text: You don't need to tell me, I'll show you more than that……!
text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa

text_block_list.text: <Let's both have a good race>
text_block_list.name: Montjeu

text_block_list.text:
The world's most prominent race, the 『Prix de l'Arc de 
Triomphe』…… against other world class Uma Musume, and France's 
strongest, Montjeu……
text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa

text_block_list.text:
The stage is set. I've done my best, and will bring all my 
strength to bear, for my dream――to be the world's strongest!
text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa

text_block_list.text:
Will Japan's El Condor Pasa be the first to defeat the world's 
strongest opponents, including Montjeu, and grasp victory!?
text_block_list.name: Announcer

text_block_list.text:
Finally, the Uma Musume leave the paddock and head 
towards the stage of the 『Prix de l'Arc de Triomphe』……!
text_block_list.name: Announcer
